survey.question: How much did you enjoy the task?
How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?
How successful do you think you were at completing the task?
How difficult was it to understand your partner's instructions?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of English?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of Spanish?
How likely do you think it is that your partner is bilingual?
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: friendly
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: smart
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: collaborative
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: honest
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: funny
How likely do you think it was that you were talking to a chatbot rather than a human?
If you were communicating with a chat bot, would you want them to communicate in both English and Spanish?

chat.msg: hey!!! ya comenzamos?
si
genial! estoy parado en el punto de partida
I see a twig to my left that leads to a small island with a tiger. What path should I take?
Take the path towards the twig onto the island with the tiger
cool! i'm now on the island with the tiger
¿Adónde vamos ahora?
To your left you will see a twig on another island with a parrot. Follow this path.
alright, now i'm on the island with the parrot sitting on a tree
what's next?
to your left you will see rocks that lead to an island with frogs. Take this path
done! i'm on the frog island now
¿que sigue?
Now, there will be a path with crocodiles that leads you onto an island with elephants. Take this path
gotcha! now i'm with the elephant again
where to next bud?
walk the rocks onto the island with the giraffe
sounds good
ahora me estoy relajando con la jirafa
cross the twig onto the island with the snake
ok, now i'm hanging with the snake
what's next?
now look for the treasure
woohoo! i found the treasure
*finalizado*

chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
si
great! start by taking a few steps to your left, underneath that wooden bench over there
Allí verás un sendero, crúzalo hacia el puesto de floristería. pero no llegues hasta el final
okay, listo
perfecto! ahora da media vuelta a la izquierda, cruza de nuevo el sendero y vuelve hacia el perrito blanco
Okay, estory con el perrito blanco
bien, ahora cruza esa rama delante de ti para dirigirte hacia el sur
seguirás viendo a otro amigo perruno que está junto a un mantel de picnic a cuadros
Okay, si veo al otro perrito
excelente! la ruta sigue por encima del mantel de picnic, roza con cuidado el recipiente de bayas y sigue hacia el oeste
okay, ahora que sigue?
You will find another wooden branch that crosses the river, take it to the north
Done, what's next?
good job! now, you'll see a green bush in front of you
rodéalo por el lado derecho hasta llegar al puesto de floristería.
Okay, I have reached the florist, where to now?
great! let's go left and get under the stand there
you'll see a big bridge with some bikers on it. let's get past that!
okay, I have crossed the bridge and now am at a grocery stand
perfect! just a few steps past the bridge, you'll see a couple of old folks on a bench, reading their newspapers
agradable y tranquilo, ¿eh?
okay, I see the couple, now what?
now, make a small detour to the south between the old folks and a wooden branch close by
you should see a green bush at the end of the branch
okay I see the green bush
great! now, let's head east, keeping the branch and the bush on your sides
sigue caminando un poco
okay, ahora veo un venado
¡perfecto, has llegado! este pequeño venado es nuestro objetivo final
well done!
great!
¡Encantado de ayudarle! ¡Juguemos de nuevo pronto!
okay, thanks!
you're welcome! looking forward to our next adventure!

chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
si
perfecto! estoy en la carpa en el norte del mapa
I see a dog and a fire to the south. Where are we going?
walk towards the dog then take a left. You should end up near a fire
alrighty, i'm by the fire now
Vi un hongo rojo a la derecha. ¿que sigue?
Take the road by the fire that leads south. Go south until you reach a telescope stand
okay, i'm at the blue telescope
hay rocas y una casa de madera a la izquierda, ¿qué hago?
Genail! Camina hacia las rocas que conducen a la casa de madera
hecho, estoy en la casa de madera *finished*

chat.msg: hey, estas listo?
si
si
genial, ahora vas a notar un cachorrito marrón
pásalo por la izquierda, ligeramente a la izquierda y luego gira a la derecha hacia el sur
okay, ahora para donde?
vas a cruzar entre una roca grande a tu izquierda y una pequeña a tu derecha, enfílate hacia el océano
do you see the water?
yes, I see the water
awesome! step into the water, spot that big red crab? make a right turn and continue along the big rock towards the west
¿Cómo se siente el agua?
La agua se siente muy fria
¡eso te mantendrá alerta! sigue adelante, después de pasar una tercera roca de tamaño medio, verás un tiburón
turn right decisively
okay, I have turned right
perfecto, ahora de vuelta a la tierra, pasa entre esa roca mediana y una pelota azul-amarillo-blanca y sigue al norte
okay, listo!
nailed it! ahora gira un poco a la izquierda y ve al noroeste, vas a cruzar entre una tienda roja a tu izquierda y un altavoz grande a tu derecha
si, what's next?
you're doing great, friend! make a semicircle around the red tent, and then go south towards the sea
okay, where to now?
no llegues al agua aún, gira a la derecha justo en la orilla y camina por debajo de un kayak rojo hacia el oeste
okay, I have reached the kayak
perfecto! da un giro de 90 grados a la derecha y muévete al norte junto al kayak hasta que llegues a un pequeño arbusto verde
That's your goal!

general_survey.answer: Yes, I currently live in a home where Spanish is predominantly spoken.
general_survey.question: Have you ever lived in a home environment or country where your second language was spoken? If so, please explain briefly:
On a day-to-day basis, how likely are you to have a conversation using both your first and second languages?
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At work
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At home
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with friends
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with family
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Using social media
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: I typically think that they are mixing languages because they are unable to fully express their thoughts in one language.
general_survey.question: What do you think when others mix languages in conversation? Please explain:
Any final comments about your language background?
